nodes.text: Contract AA23 is a roleplaying-game adventure in the Living Force campaign that was written by Russell Foubert and Sean Yo. The title is a reference to AA-23, the detention block aboard the Death Star in which Leia Organa is kept in Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope.

The heroes are sent to Nar Shaddaa to escort Korlana Toryn, the daughter of an important senator, back to Coruscant. However, an old bounty placed on them by Velin Wir just before his death 10 years before resurfaces, and they are attacked by bounty hunters.
